nodes.text: Jeraa Sulyan was a Force-sensitive native to the planet Balmorra who was among those the Balmorran resistance and the Galactic Republic attempted to smuggle offworld during the Cold War. However, Sulyan and the others were captured by the Sith Empire when their hiding place in Cave 52 was overrun.

If players choose the light side option and conceal the Force-sensitives' presence in Cave 52, Sulyan will send the player a message. However, Imperial players are assumed to choose the dark side alignment options.
